decision_conditions: The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.
The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Notwithstanding the provisions of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (or any order revoking and re-enacting that order with or without modification), no window(s)/door(s) shall be installed in the first floor flank elevation(s) of the development hereby permitted without the prior permission in writing of the local planning authority.
description: Single storey side extension; first floor rear extension; alterations to existing conservatory roof; external alterations
